item.title: Tweet - 71994560548577280
item.description: So, this is heaven… a lot like home on a sunny afternoon with some beers chilling in the fridge. Thanks nature! No #Rapture req’d ❤️ 0 | 🔃 0

item.title: Tweet - 71888167535521792
item.description: Thought I saw a 2 headed bird. Turned out to be 2 birds. No other signs of #Rapture ❤️ 0 | 🔃 0
